Line 45: Line 45:
===Spreadsheets that are parts of suites===
===Spreadsheets that are parts of suites===
â
*[[602 Office Tab]] - for MS Windows. Formerly freeware, has PDF export. Can open Excel and older Lotus 123 and Quattro Pro files.<ref>[http://www.software602.com/products/pcs/ 602PC SUITE - FREE Office Suite Trial with PDF Export<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
 
*[[Ability Office]] Spreadsheet - for MS Windows. <ref>[http://www.ability.com/ Ability Plus Software - Home Page<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
*[[Ability Office]] Spreadsheet - for MS Windows. <ref>[http://www.ability.com/ Ability Plus Software - Home Page<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
â
*[[Applixware]] Spreadsheets - for MS Windows and Linux. Programmed with the Applixware programming language (ELF). There's a [[word processor]] and [[presentation]] program that comes with it too.<ref>http://www.vistasource.com/vs2/en/applixware.php</ref>
 
*[[Apple iWork]] [[Numbers (software)|Numbers]], included with Apple's [[iWork]] '08 suite exclusively for Mac OS X v10.4 or higher.
*[[Apple iWork]] [[Numbers (software)|Numbers]], included with Apple's [[iWork]] '08 suite exclusively for Mac OS X v10.4 or higher.
*[[AppleWorks]] - for MS Windows and Macintosh. This is a further development of the historical [[Claris Works]] Office suite.<ref>[http://www.apple.com/appleworks/ Apple - Support - AppleWorks<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
*[[AppleWorks]] - for MS Windows and Macintosh. This is a further development of the historical [[Claris Works]] Office suite.<ref>[http://www.apple.com/appleworks/ Apple - Support - AppleWorks<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
â
*[[Ashampoo Office]] PlanMaker - for MS Windows. Uses the same codebase as Softmaker Office Planmaker.<ref>[http://www.ashampoo.com/ Ashampoo - We Make Software!<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
 
*[[WordPerfect Office]] [[Quattro Pro]] - for MS Windows. Was one of the big three spreadsheets (the others being Lotus 123 and Excel).<ref>[http://www.corel.com/ Untitled Document<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
*[[WordPerfect Office]] [[Quattro Pro]] - for MS Windows. Was one of the big three spreadsheets (the others being Lotus 123 and Excel).<ref>[http://www.corel.com/ Untitled Document<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
*[[EasyOffice]] EasySpreadsheet - for MS Windows. No longer freeware, this suite aims to be more user friendly than competitors.<ref>http://www.e-press.com/home.asp</ref>
*[[EasyOffice]] EasySpreadsheet - for MS Windows. No longer freeware, this suite aims to be more user friendly than competitors.<ref>http://www.e-press.com/home.asp</ref>
â
*[[Evermore Integrated Office]] Spreadsheet - for MS Windows and Linux.<ref>[http://www.evermoresw.com/weben/index.jsp Evermore Integrated Office<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
 
*[[Framework (office suite)|Framework]] - for MS Windows. Historical office suite still available and supported. It includes a spreadsheet.<ref>[http://www.framework.com/ Framework home page & the FRED Computer Language, Framework IV, II, III, V, VI, VI, VII<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
*[[Framework (office suite)|Framework]] - for MS Windows. Historical office suite still available and supported. It includes a spreadsheet.<ref>[http://www.framework.com/ Framework home page & the FRED Computer Language, Framework IV, II, III, V, VI, VI, VII<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
â
*[[Gobe Spreadsheet]] - for MS Windows. Developed by some of the authors of [[ClarisWorks]].<ref>[http://www.gobe.com/ GoBe Productive<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
 
*[[Lotus SmartSuite]] [[Lotus 123]] - for MS Windows. Widely considered to be responsible for the explosion of popularity of spreadsheets during the 80's and early 90's.<ref>[http://www-142.ibm.com/software/sw-lotus/products/product2.nsf/wdocs/sshome IBM office productivity suite - Lotus SmartSuite<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
*[[Lotus SmartSuite]] [[Lotus 123]] - for MS Windows. Widely considered to be responsible for the explosion of popularity of spreadsheets during the 80's and early 90's.<ref>[http://www-142.ibm.com/software/sw-lotus/products/product2.nsf/wdocs/sshome IBM office productivity suite - Lotus SmartSuite<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
*[[Mariner software|MarinerPak]] [[Mariner software|Mariner Calc]] - for Apple Macintosh. Full featured and light weight.<ref name=autogenerated2>[http://www.marinersoftware.com/sitepage.php?page=14 Macintosh Spreadsheet Software by Mariner Software<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
*[[Mariner software|MarinerPak]] [[Mariner software|Mariner Calc]] - for Apple Macintosh. Full featured and light weight.<ref name=autogenerated2>[http://www.marinersoftware.com/sitepage.php?page=14 Macintosh Spreadsheet Software by Mariner Software<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
*[[Microsoft Office]] [[Microsoft Excel|Excel]] - for MS Windows and Macintosh. The proprietary spreadsheet leader.<ref>http://office.microsoft.com/excel/</ref>
*[[Microsoft Office]] [[Microsoft Excel|Excel]] - for MS Windows and Macintosh. The proprietary spreadsheet leader.<ref>http://office.microsoft.com/excel/</ref>
*[[Microsoft Works]] Spreadsheet - for MS Windows (previously DOS and Machintosh). Only allows one sheet at a time.<ref>[http://www.microsoft.com/products/works/default.mspx Microsoft Works Home<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
*[[Microsoft Works]] Spreadsheet - for MS Windows (previously DOS and Machintosh). Only allows one sheet at a time.<ref>[http://www.microsoft.com/products/works/default.mspx Microsoft Works Home<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
â
*[[Papyrus (word processing program)|Papyrus]] - for Windows and Macintosh. <ref>[http://www.rom-logicware.com/papyrus.htm About Papyrus OFFICE in English<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
  â
*[[RagTime]] - for Windows and Macintosh. <ref>[http://www.ragtime-online.com/ RagTime - Business Publishing Software<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
  â
*[[Softmaker Office]] PlanMaker - for MS Windows and Linux. Made by a [[Germany|German]] company.<ref>[http://www.softmaker.com/english/tmw_en.htm SoftMaker : SoftMaker Office (office suite)<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
 
*[[StarOffice]] Calc - Cross-platform. StarOffice was originally developed by the German company Star Division which was purchased by [[Sun Microsystems|Sun]] in 1998. The code was made open source and became [[OpenOffice.org]]. Sun continues developing the commercial version which periodically integrates the open source code with their own and third party code to make new low price versions.<ref>[http://www.sun.com/software/star/staroffice/index.jsp StarOffice 8<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
*[[StarOffice]] Calc - Cross-platform. StarOffice was originally developed by the German company Star Division which was purchased by [[Sun Microsystems|Sun]] in 1998. The code was made open source and became [[OpenOffice.org]]. Sun continues developing the commercial version which periodically integrates the open source code with their own and third party code to make new low price versions.<ref>[http://www.sun.com/software/star/staroffice/index.jsp StarOffice 8<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
â
*[[Techdigm Office]] Calc - for MS Windows and Linux. <ref>[http://www.techdigm.com/product.jsp Techdigm<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
  â
*[[ThinkFree Office Desktop]] Calc - Cross-platform. Online, server, portable and desktop versions available. <ref>[http://product.thinkfree.com/ ThinkFree - Products<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
 
*[[XOOM|Xoom Office]] Spreadsheet - for MS Windows. <ref>[http://web.archive.org/web/19970414171055/www.xoom.com/html/newxoom/programs.htm Xoom Software, Inc<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
*[[XOOM|Xoom Office]] Spreadsheet - for MS Windows. <ref>[http://web.archive.org/web/19970414171055/www.xoom.com/html/newxoom/programs.htm Xoom Software, Inc<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
